channel.title: Comments on: Trust Me: Credibility is the Future of Journalism

item.title: By: joulesm
item.dc:creator: joulesm
item.description: what's the general sentiment (trustworthiness) of Snopes?? I see meme-ish things going around Facebook a lot (example: http://www.snopes.com/risque/homosex/sagging.asp) and use Snopes to tell people how stupid they are for reposting dumb things, but I'll be honest, I don't fact check anything beyond that.
item.content:encoded: what’s the general sentiment (trustworthiness) of Snopes?? I see meme-ish things going around Facebook a lot (example: http://www.snopes.com/risque/homosex/sagging.asp) and use Snopes to tell people how stupid they are for reposting dumb things, but I’ll be honest, I don’t fact check anything beyond that.
